column3: “Hitting this again for the second time, high impacts of Euphoria, and pain numbing hits not only my joints but inside my bones. This is a veteran strain fer sure. If you need to be knocked out be pre-paired to be couch locked. Ultra top shelf nugs, these dank nuggeteers pack a powerful punch since blue power is crossed with this strain its incredibly heavy. Dry eyes more than mouth, but mega chill and social. Absolut...”

“It had been a long, stressful day, which also included the big heavy trash barrel tipping over twice while I was rolling it out to the curb. This triggered back pain and muscle spasms from trying to catch it and lift it back upright without dumping all the contents. Sin mint cookies is sort of sweet with a mix of earthy pine and mint. It had sticky green buds with lots of orange. Nice smooth mild hits from an ice bon...”

“702 really came through with this super charged strain. with its confusing smell and luring hue you can't help but gravitate towards these bids. the tricromes are so big and plenty you can see your reflection. it's peppery and minty scent reminded me of the inside of my mama's purse.”
“After painful research😂, SinMint is my strain!!"  Does everything
column4: including help w/ neuropathy/ severe nerve damage & pain. So grateful to have found it! Wish it was more popular!”"

column3: “Tried this out today and I was  - well medicated ! Tight buds, the strain that I have is nearly 28% THC ..... Kicks ass! Does not disappoint!   From BaM”

“I picked this up because of its consensus effects on pain and inflammation. I was not disappointed. I have severe osteoarthritis. Inflammation and sharp stabbing pains are a fact of life. This strain has proven to be a big help. It's not a daytime strain for active outdoor activities. It's a settle back in the evening, slip into restful sleep strain. It's not mind-clouding. It's more about letting go of stress and st...”

“OMG! I have excruciating cramps, but 1 toke of SinMint Cookies and I am crampfree & floating on top of the world. I've been unfortunately been popping Motrins all day and they did nothing! I also want to thank the young lady who helped me. I didn't get her name, but I truly appreciated her compassion(& knowledge)towards me as a patient. Plus I bought 2 prerolls & got 1 free.”

“Damn!  Just grabbed a 1g pre-roll from Green Pharms in Mesa, AZ.  Was expecting the typical pre-roll mediocrity of many other places.  This was divine! Only smoked 1/2, and still feeling fantastic after 2.5 hours.  Knocks me into the couch, takes away all anxiety, made me hungry about 30 min after smoking & could sleep, but don't HAVE to. 

This is a keeper!”
“I posted the background pic it's Great hybrid strain from Altitude Organic haven't seen a test from yet but looks good, smells great and smokes smooth”
“Careful, this one is potent, Not for the light smoker. The more experienced smoker will enjoy the relaxing euphoric high. One of my favs, for sure.”

“This one is worth trying. To my picky surprise it is quite good. I'm handicapped and can't do the light weight bud. I use bud instead of my pain medication. So suffice to say potency is necessary. This bud hits what I look for. Try and you won't be disappointed.”
“Great smoke, slightly harsh. Relaxing, balanced blend of cannabinoides & terpenes. Perfect stash for weekend sessions.”

“A delightful twist on our fave GSCs. Same potency with an opiate-like initial rush, which plateaus for a little while before a creeper 2nd wave completely knocks the crap out of any bummer day! Great meds for depression, stress and social anxiety... Or overdo it a little to fall asleep quick!”
“Very potent after 2 bowls. The only con is smells like skunk so badly, but helped my nerve and joint pain.”

“Writing this so I won't forget -- Sin Mints is in my top 5!  Blissful, euphoric, in no pain, brain's off
And I am able to eat for the first time today. 

Smoked smooth, great funky flavor and long lasting high.  

This couch is as perfect as the movie I'm watching. Wow.”
“Very nice! Test results show THC is 13%, but seem much stronger because effects are good! very recommended”
“Great smoke, slightly harsh. Relaxing, balanced blend of cannabinoides & terpenes. Perfect stash for weekend sessions.”

“This one is worth trying. To my picky surprise it is quite good. I'm handicapped and can't do the light weight bud. I use bud instead of my pain medication. So suffice to say potency is necessary. This bud hits what I look for. Try and you won't be disappointed.”
“Very nice! Test results show THC is 13%, but seem much stronger because effects are good! very recommended”
“Very nice energetic high”

“Extremely dense nugs with light green and purple leaves covered with orange hairs and visible trichomes. A dank and earthy aroma that’s slightly sweet. Very tasty and smooth smoke and makes a great slow-burning sessioner. A very solid stone with a good amount of couch lock and body relaxation and slight euphoria and mind stimulation.”
“Nice hybrid. Not real potent. I tore through a half-gram of shatter over the course of several hours. Pleasant buzz.”

“This Strain gives me a clear mind and a relaxed body. Definitely lovin this strain. I can taste a little hint of mint but it doesn't give me that cool feeling mint does. This strain does feel like a indica. Something that can put me to sleep.”
“Amazing relaxing perfect for my pain yesss”
“okok I got another batch and its the same one just grabbed a new one anywhoo soooooo gooood I broke my pinky and it has relaxed the day lights outta me and I don't even notice the pain damn good”
“sweet and minty , great knock you on your ass bud. cookies are always so bomb, this is no exception”
“Great taste, slight upper.  Not work friendly”
“Amazing relaxing perfect for my pain yesss”

“My SinMint Cookies (AKA SinMint) Hybrid was cultivated by Pearl Pharma & had a whopping 29% THC! This strain made me happy & relaxed followed by complete euphoria! Buds were dense & pine coned shaped. Buds looked lighter in color then they were because they were covered in frosty trichomes. Light orange hairs were few across the bud. Smell was a sweet nutty spearmint with the taste about the same. Reminded me of Wrig...”

“Super raw rosin! It smells so good and terpy of gas, earthy, skunk. That pungent smell I like. I'm a gassy/ diesel type of person. Great strain. Definitely a couch locker. Dabbed this and didn't even move for 30mins in like a coma-space state of mind😂 Great product highly suggested for insomnia, pains, ADHD.”

“This is the kind of flower that you can tell is going to be very good even though it may not really look super crazy. Its a nice dark green and the bugs are sticky and dense with a resinous output. I wish it was either indica or sativa though, I'm starting to realize that hybrids aren't for me. all in all i give it a strong 4. to light 4.5”
“Very nice energetic high”
“Nice hybrid. Not real potent. I tore through a half-gram of shatter over the course of several hours. Pleasant buzz.”
“Taste amazing.”
“Awesome!! Minty and just so yummy, the buzz is great for bad mood or anxiety i found! Love it! Will have again!”
“Great taste, slight upper.  Not work friendly”
“nice but weird! testing at only 13% THC but effects were great!”

“Definitely smells minty. Another mellow high with a little body heaviness but not that strong, I could move around fine without going into a couch lock. However, I wouldn't use it if you have something to do. This is more of an evening strain to smoke after work. Puts you into a peaceful euphoric high that will kill your stresses and anxiety. Does give a nice body relaxing tingling feeling all over.
Medical use I hig...”

“One of the first strains I tried and the first cookie strain I had definitely one of my favorites I would definitely get this if your thinking about it it doesn't knock you out which is great if you still planned on doing things later in the day definitely wouldn't drive anywhere though”
“Wowsers minty stuff here!”

“Have a pretty high tolerance. Great piercing high. 
Felt the intense effect of this indica dominate strain. Don’t smoke before a mind intensive task such a work. Although, cotton mouth and dry eyes will most defiantly be present.”

“First off! I love this place. The staff here is awesome very helpful they are never rude to me when i come in or any customers. This place is very convenient. They have a wide selection of stuff to choose from. The store is very clean and organized. Prices are reasonable. #1 spot on the map!.”
“Very heavy strain, starts off with a real head high and then mellows out to a body relaxation session. Great for muscle pain relief, and induced appetite for me.”
“Made me super sleepy but in a good way. Real potent strain. A couple puffs had me feeling the effects. Chill vibes”
“Nice!!! Ideal for the daytime. Smooth...”
“This strain got my friends and I so baked. We were seriously laughing for 10 minutes straight, or at least it felt that way. Made me really relaxed, happy and talkative. Tingly too.”
“Incredibly potent, tons of crystals, and very purple. 10/10”
“The beauty of this bud is un real. At 26% thc one hit and I’m well medicated. The euphoria is incredible! I am in love with with strain. So frosty. Anxiety killer”

“This is an excellent high. Very interesting physical high especially across the chest, lots of couchlock and an easy-to-derail train of thought. Effective for depression, anxiety and making food documentaries an emotional experience. Will buy again.”
“Super smooth smoke from start to finish and the smell is outta this world. ...def a strain for creativity.”
“I love my GSC and this is the perfect thin mint"!  The perfect indica dominant happy hybrid
column5: appetite stimulator....perfect for after work!  It's so fun to see all the new Vegas strains and this one is on point!”"

column3: “Got me real stoned but with a slight head ache, I dunno maybe a bad batch”

“This is muscle numbing to the core - frees up your mind to chat chat chat! Doesn't hit you in the face like some strains do. Friend had nausea that went away completely after smoking. Highly recommend this for anyone who wants to unwind with an upbeat, bouncy high.

PreRoll - North Gardens 
THCA - 30.9%
THC - 27.66%
CBD - .07%
TOTAL - 33.6%”
“Beautiful flower! I feel amaaaazinggg”
“definitely a laid back high. And the bud smells and taste like a hint of mint. a must try!”

“This strain is great! Worth the extra cash from the lower shelf but still shouldn't be 55/8th! Not based on its great look and high thc! Based on that they're charging tourist prices for it and it's not recreational! 
California owners I would imagine, giving tourist weed at top shelf prices, playing their games here! Strain's so good it gets 4/5 even with the prices in Las Vegas!”
“Relaxing body high very soothing ...sticky frosty buds.”
“nice flavor. burns well. good high.”
“Over 28% thc this is a must try Vegas ...Body and Mind. keep up the great work ..”

“super fire!!! definitely in making it into my top 5 strains. also the bud are so beautiful.  nice and frosty with purple scatter throughout just about ever nug..... if u haven't  tried it I'd encourage  you too.. :)”

“it's very very good such a good hybrid the only thing that didn't throw that last star was the smell and taste they were good just wish more of a slap in the face when u smell it and the taste wasn't too bad”
“Really relaxing with a long lasting high”
“dank!”

“Appearance is very dense and tight  structured buds coated in a very frosty amount of trichomes. 

Smell: Earthy with a sweet undertone. 

Taste: came through with a sweet maybe not minty but a lite floral taste on exhale 

Effects: very  cerebral and tad bit spacy tho the description says leans to indica side where I mostly notice that in a very nice  body relaxed feeling . pain reliever but  I seen in fellow review...”
“Harsh taste but smooth vape. Minty on the exhale, but not refreshingly so. My batch looks to be more sativa popcorn buds, bright green. Gets me moving,  but   gives me the munchies afterward.”

“The taste is what got the most attention from me! The high is great but the taste was FENOMINAL! Its like that very first taste you get hitting a blunt for the first time but EVERY SINGLE TIME you hit it! Never ending burst of great weed flavor. Not to mention I have a pretty high tolerance but this strain got me higher than most weeds! Very Impressed.”

“Never in my life have I felt so motherfucking disrespected. I suffer from depression, anxiety, and fibromyalgia, along with many other mental and physical disorders. I smoked a bowl with my fiance and shortly after feeling the effects, I went into a raging fit of anxiety, stomach pains that mimic labor pains, and suicide ideation that was topped with a thick layer of deep regret and disappointment. I will never buy t...”
